ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Since 2018, Jorge Alarcón has been enhancing his expertise in Software Development and Data Science, currently working and gaining experience as a Full Stack DevOps and Data Engineer. Previously worked as a Civil Engineer in Peru and Brazil, focusing on process automation.

With over seven years of experience in Linux, Python and Rust, Jorge Alarcón specializes in developing CI/CD and data pipelines, implementing various API architectures with Test-Driven Development (TDD) and clean architecture to ensure efficiency and reliability. His expertise extends to deploying and orchestrating cloud services using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) on AWS (ECS and EKS).
